```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(conflicted)
library(devtools)
library(DiagrammeR)
library(here)
library(igraph)
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
library(pedtools)
library(roxygen2)
library(tidyverse)
library(visNetwork)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  message  = FALSE,
  warning  = FALSE,
  echo     = TRUE,
  include  = TRUE,
  eval     = TRUE,
  comment  = ""
)
conflicts_prefer(lubridate::interval)
conflicts_prefer(dplyr::filter)
conflicts_prefer(purrr::set_names)
studbook <- read_csv(here("inst/extdata/studbook.csv"))
pedigree <- featured_pedigree(studbook)
```

```{r}
vertices <- ped_verts(studbook, pedigree)
edges    <- edges_igraph(studbook, pedigree)
```

```{r}
ped_vis <- ped_visNet(studbook, pedigree)
```

```{r}
nodes <- ped_visNodes(studbook, pedigree)
```


```{r}
ped_visNet(studbook, pedigree)
```
